summary: CONSUMER STATED THERE WERE PROBLEMS WITH THE ENGINE. CONSUMER ALSO STATED  WHILE DRIVING, THE ENGINE STALLED AND ALSO INDICATE THAT IT ONLY HAPPENS WHEN THE ENGINE WARMS UP AND IT WILL NEVER DO IT WHEN THE ENGINE IS COLD. DEALER WAS CONTACTED AND VEHICLE HAS BEEN AT THE SHOP AT LEAST SIX TIMES AND THEY CAN FIND THE PROBLEM.*JB
